category.name: Subscription Monitor
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SCM_notification_history
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the notification history audit record is enabled or disabled. Audit logs with event type Email_Send and Email_Not_Send shows email was sent or not respectively. Valid Values: true: Enables auditing of email sent or not. false: Suppresses auditing of email sent or not.
